mode.name: Border color mode
mode.hint: Use Foundry disposition colors, a custom color, or colors based on health condition.

customColor.name: Custom color (hex or CSS)
customColor.hint: Used only when Color mode = Custom. Examples: #88ccff or rgb(136,204,255).

hideDefaultBorder.name: Hide Default Foundry Border
hideDefaultBorder.hint: Hide Foundry’s built-in selection border on tokens.

enableTarget.name: Enable target border
enableTarget.hint: Also show the outline and glow on tokens you target.

enableGlow.name: Enable glow
enableGlow.hint: If enabled, tokens will also get a soft glow that follows the outline color.

glowDistance.name: Glow distance
glowDistance.hint: Glow radius in pixels. Larger values expand the glow outward.

glowOuterStrength.name: Glow outer strength
glowOuterStrength.hint: Intensity of the outer glow. Higher values are brighter.

help.disposition: Color border based on token’s Foundry disposition.
help.custom: Color border based on a predefined hex color.
help.condition: Color border based on the bar1 attribute (usually Health).
